entities.name: rufus scrimgeour
entities.description: Rufus Scrimgeour is introduced as the Minister for Magic, and later described in detail by the Prime Minister.

entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is mentioned as a position of authority, and is described as distracted and watching Rufus Scrimgeour.

relationships.description: The Prime Minister meets Rufus Scrimgeour, and is described as watching him straighten up and look around.
